languages.text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Однако, судя по его любезности с юным Зауэрбэком, он явно желает укрепить свои отношения с этим домом. Старшие Зауэрбэк и Гапрак шепчутся в другом углу — Зауэрбэк, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Однако, судя по его любезности с юным Зауэрбеком, он явно желает укрепить свои отношения с этим домом. Старшие Зауэрбек и Гапрак шепчутся в другом углу — Зауэрбек, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Драйвстем, очевидно, все еще является лидером аристократии Даргонуса. Однако, судя по его любезности с юным Зауэрбэком, он явно желает укрепить свои отношения с этим домом. Старшие Зауэрбэк и Гапрак шепчутся в другом углу — Зауэрбэк, чей род относится к вам весьма прохладно, наверняка пытается перетянуть на свою сторону Гапрак.{/n}

But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with this house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドライブステンがダルゴナス貴族の指導者の地位を保っているのは明らかだ。だが、ヤング・ザウアーバックに礼儀正しく接していることから、ザウアーバック家と深い関係を築きたい思惑が見える。シニア・ザウアーバックとギャプラックは別の場所でひそひそ話をしている――ザウアーバックの一族はあなたに対してよそよそしい態度をとっているようなので、ギャプラックを引き込んでおこうとしているに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステンがダルゴナス貴族の指導者の地位を保っているのは明らかだ。だが、ヤング・ザウアーバックに礼儀正しく接していることから、ザウアーバック家と深い関係を築きたい思惑が見える。シニア・ザウアーバックとギャプラックは別の場所でひそひそ話をしている――ザウアーバックの一族はあなたに対してよそよそしい態度をとっているようなので、ギャプラックを引き込んでおこうとしているに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔依然是达戈努斯贵族阶级的领袖。不过，从他对待年轻的苏尔贝克的态度来看，他显然想加强与这个家族的关系。年长的苏尔贝克和贾帕克正在另一个角落里窃窃私语。苏尔贝克家族似乎对你冷眼相待，正打算把贾帕克家族拉到他们的阵营中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔依然是达戈努斯贵族阶级的领袖。不过，从他对待年轻的苏尔贝克的态度来看，他显然想加强与这个家族的关系。年长的苏尔贝克和贾帕克正在另一个角落里窃窃私语。苏尔贝克家族似乎对你冷眼相待，正打算把贾帕克家族拉到他们的阵营中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Claramente, Drivestem sigue siendo el líder de los aristócratas de Dargonus, pero a juzgar por la cortesía con la que trata al joven Sauerback tiene intención de reforzar sus lazos con dicha casa. Los representantes de mayor edad de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak están cuchicheando en un rincón. Sauerback, cuya familia parece estar haciéndote el vacío, debe de estar intentando convencer a Gaprak para que le apoye.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Claramente, Drivestem sigue siendo el líder de los aristócratas de Dargonus, pero a juzgar por la cortesía con la que trata al joven Sauerback tiene intención de reforzar sus lazos con dicha casa. Los representantes de mayor edad de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak están cuchicheando en un rincón. Sauerback, cuya familia parece estar haciéndote el vacío, debe de estar intentando convencer a Gaprak para que le apoye.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Manifestement, Drivestem est toujours la figure de proue de l'aristocratie de Dargonus. L'extrême courtoisie dont il fait preuve envers le jeune Sauerback laisse néanmoins présager qu'il cherche à renforcer ses liens avec cette maison qui semble pourtant décidée à vous snober. L'aîné des Sauerback, quant à lui, chuchote un peu plus loin avec la représentante des Gaprak, probablement dans l'espoir de la gagner à sa cause.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Manifestement, Drivestem est toujours la figure de proue de l'aristocratie de Dargonus. L'extrême courtoisie dont il fait preuve envers le jeune Sauerback laisse néanmoins présager qu'il cherche à renforcer ses liens avec cette maison qui semble pourtant décidée à vous snober. L'aîné des Sauerback, quant à lui, chuchote un peu plus loin avec la représentante des Grapak, probablement dans l'espoir de la gagner à sa cause.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem ist offensichtlich nach wie vor der Anführer des Adels von Dargonus. Aber angesichts seines höflichen Umgangs mit dem jungen Sauerback scheint er eindeutig seine Verbindung mit diesem Haus stärken zu wollen. In einer anderen Ecke sind die Oberhäupter von Sauerback und Gaprak flüsternd ins Gespräch vertieft – Sauerback, dessen Familie dir die kalte Schulter zu zeigen scheint, will wohl Gaprak auf seine Seite ziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem ist offensichtlich nach wie vor der Anführer des Adels von Dargonus. Aber angesichts seines höflichen Umgangs mit dem jungen Sauerback scheint er eindeutig seine Verbindung mit diesem Haus stärken zu wollen. In einer anderen Ecke sind die Oberhäupter von Sauerback und Gaprak flüsternd ins Gespräch vertieft – Sauerback, dessen Familie dir die kalte Schulter zu zeigen scheint, will wohl Gaprak auf seine Seite ziehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem, elbette Dargonus aristokrasisinin lideri olarak konumunu koruyor. Öte yandan valinin genç Sauerback'e gösterdiği nezakete bakıldığında, o haneyle olan ilişkisini sağlama almak istediği göze çarpıyor. Sauerback ve Gaprak ailelerinin yaşça büyük fertleri ise bir başka köşede fısıldaşıyor... Ailesi sana yüz vermeyen Sauerback, Gaprak'ı da safına çekmeye çalışıyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem is, obviously, still the leader of Dargonus aristocracy. But, judging by the courtesy he is showing to young Sauerback, he clearly wants to strengthen his relationship with that house. The senior Sauerback and Gaprak are whispering in another corner — Sauerback, whose family seems to be giving you the cold shoulder, must be trying to sway Gaprak to his side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem, elbette Dargonus aristokrasisinin lideri olarak konumunu koruyor. Öte yandan, valinin genç Sauerback'e gösterdiği nezakete bakıldığında, o haneyle olan ilişkisini sağlama almayı istediği göze çarpıyor. Sauerback ve Gaprak ailelerinin yaşça büyük fertleri ise bir başka köşede fısıldıyor... Ailesi sana yüz vermeyen Sauerback, Gaprak'ı da kendi yanına çekmeye çalışıyor olmalı.{/n}
